exercise.title: 01.03 Try JavaScript
exercise.p: Step 1. Create a new folder with the name oswd on the M:-drive. Then create an empty HTML page with the name first.html and save it in the folder oswd. Open the page in a web browser (Chrome).
Step 2. Add a new <script> element to the <body> element of the HTML page. Then copy/paste the following JavaScript code to the <script> element:
Step 3. Open the page again in a web browser (Chrome). Move the cursor on the page and see what happens. Finally, submit the complete source code of the HTML page.
